name: Ever-Peaceful Dream
desc: After ally targets enter battle or after a memosprite is summoned, advances their action by 50% after their first turn ends and increases their DMG dealt by 50% for 4 turn(s).
enhanced_desc: After ally targets enter battle or after a memosprite is summoned, advances their action by 75% after their first turn ends and increases their DMG dealt by 75% for 4 turn(s).
